data.text: This is the message that Yahweh showed me in a vision, concerning Jerusalem and the rest of Judea:
I saw that in the future, the hill on which Yahweh’s temple is built
People from many people-groups will say to each other,
Yahweh will listen to the disputes between nations
You Israeli people,
Yahweh, you have abandoned us your people
Israel is full of silver and gold;
But the land is also full of idols;
So now they will be humbled
All you people should crawl into the caves in the rock cliffs!
Yahweh will cause you people to no longer be arrogant,
The Commander of the armies of angels has chosen a day
He will get rid of all those who think they should be admired like [MET] the tall cedar trees in Lebanon,
He will get rid of all those who think they are as great as [MET] all the high hills
He will get rid of all those who think that they are high towers
He will destroy all those who are rich because they own big ships that carry goods to other countries
He will cause people to no longer be arrogant
All idols will ◄disappear/be destroyed►.
When Yahweh comes to shake/terrify the people on the earth,
On that day, people will get rid of all their gold and silver idols
Then they will crawl into caves
So, do not trust that people will save you,
